entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 09:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -20.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -22.5°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
